## running Seurat PCA

```{r seurat}
library(dplyr)

sc_seu <- SCTransform(sc_seu, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE)
sp_seu <- SCTransform(sp_seu, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE)

start_time <- Sys.time()

anchors <- FindTransferAnchors(reference = sc_seu, query = sp_seu, normalization.method = "SCT")

predictions.assay <- TransferData(anchorset = anchors, refdata = sc_seu$combined,
                                  weight.reduction = 'pcaproject')

end_time <- Sys.time()
end_time - start_time
```

```{r}
saveRDS(object = predictions.assay,
        file = paste0(results_folder, 'seurat/results_pca.RDS'))

predictions.assay$spot = rownames(predictions.assay)
write.csv(predictions.assay, paste0(results_folder, 'seurat/results_pca.csv'))
predictions.assay[1:5, 1:5]
```

## running Seurat CCA

```{r seurat_cca}
library(dplyr)

sc_seu <- SCTransform(sc_seu, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE)
sp_seu <- SCTransform(sp_seu, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE)

start_time <- Sys.time()

anchors <- FindTransferAnchors(reference = sc_seu, query = sp_seu, normalization.method = "SCT", reduction='cca')

predictions.assay <- TransferData(anchorset = anchors, refdata = sc_seu$combined,
                                  weight.reduction = 'cca')

end_time <- Sys.time()
end_time - start_time
```

```{r}
saveRDS(object = predictions.assay,
        file = paste0(results_folder, 'seurat/results_cca.RDS'))

predictions.assay$spot = rownames(predictions.assay)
write.csv(predictions.assay, paste0(results_folder, 'seurat/results_cca.csv'))
predictions.assay[1:5, 1:5]
```
